reviews.review_msg: It is not about how difficult the course is. The lecture/notes are totally different from what you get for assignments. Simply saying, Professor is a fantastic researcher from what I can tell. But for teaching, please stay away from him unless you have to take the course for graduation.

The course covers interesting topics and is a good introduction to Gemoetric modelling, and Prof. Zhang is knowledgable on the topics. However, most of the lectuers are spent showing his own research and not on the main concepts. The assignment and projects require a considerable amount of effort, but they will solidify what you learnt in class.
Tough course. But it will worth the effort 'cause you learn a lot from it.
